active_incidents.title: Users may be having trouble loading Slack.

notes.body:
We have identified that a small number of users may be having trouble loading Slack.

We’re still actively investigating this issue, but we don’t have any new information to share at this time.

Thanks for sticking with us as we continue to work towards a fix.

Users may be having trouble loading Slack.

We're actively looking into this, and we'll report back as more information becomes available.

active_incidents.title: Login issues for Android customers using Intune and Edge

notes.body: We’ve identified the cause of this issue and we’re working on getting a fix out as soon as possible. We’ll be back once we have another update to share.
Our investigation into this issue remains a priority. We’ll share an update as soon as it’s available. Thank you for your continued patience.

Some Android users may be experiencing issues when logging in to Slack via Microsoft Intune and the Edge browser.

We're looking into this and we'll report back as more information becomes available.
